file_content.text: Welcome to Macula Station, gateway to the Belsavis penal colonies. Feel free to ask me about our correctional facilities.
Can it, O5. This is a prison, not a tourist attraction.
Master Jedi--good to have you aboard. Warden Playt's already okayed your admittance. I take it you're... armed?
I never go anywhere without my lightsaber.
Of course.
Thought so.
A Jedi always has the Force to protect him.
More or less.
A Jedi always has the Force to protect her.
More or less.
Handy. Not quite what I meant, though.
Warden Playt's already approved your entry, Major. Please declare any weapons you might be carrying, such as blasters, knives, explosives....
Put me down for "all of the above."
This'll take a while.
Uh...of course.
Warden Playt's already cleared you for entry, Captain. Just don't let me catch you sneaking in any contraband.
I'm a professional. I never get caught.
I'm not that sloppy.
Ha. Funny.
Looks like Warden Playt's already given you clearance to enter. I'll assume you aren't bringing in anything you shouldn't be.
You're not going to frisk me, are you?
What if I am?
We've got scanners to handle that. Some species get... inventive about where they hide things.
What can you tell me about Belsavis?
What is this place?
Not much, I'm afraid. Only the worst of the worst find themselves here. Be glad your stay is only temporary.
That's it? I figured security here would be tighter.
That was easy.
We scanned your ship when you docked. Apparently the warden saw something he liked.
Normally, I'd confiscate your equipment, but the warden wants you planetside ASAP. Given the situation, I figure he'll want you carrying.
What does the warden want with me?
He's expecting me?
Couldn't say. Best not to keep him waiting, though.
What's going on?
It's bad. Can't say much else.
I have my own business on Belsavis.
Not interested.
I doubt you'll get much done down there without the warden's say-so.
Just take the shuttle and report to the warden immediately. And be careful. It's nasty down there.
Don't keep the warden waiting.
